it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface RemoteViewInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLI, GUI, RemoteView

    public interface RemoteViewInterface
    It menages interaction with user

      • weaponGrabPaymentChoice

        Event weaponGrabPaymentChoice(java.lang.String[] powerUpNames,
                              CubeColour[] powerUpColours,
                              int[] minimumPowerUpRequest,
                              int[] maximumPowerUpRequest)
        It returns how a player pay the weapon GRAB cost
        Parameters:
        powerUpNames - list of power up's name available to use
        powerUpColours - list of power up's colour available to use
        minimumPowerUpRequest - if player ammo are not enough he must pay with powerUp
        maximumPowerUpRequest - max number of power up you can use
        Returns:
        event that contains player's choice

      • weaponReloadPaymentChoice

        Event weaponReloadPaymentChoice(java.lang.String[] powerUpNames,
                                CubeColour[] powerUpColours,
                                int[] minimumPowerUpRequest,
                                int[] maximumPowerUpRequest)
        User selects how to reload his weapon: power Up, ammo or both
        Parameters:
        powerUpNames - list of power up's name available to use
        powerUpColours - list of power up's colour available to use
        minimumPowerUpRequest - if player ammo are not enough he must pay with powerUp
        maximumPowerUpRequest - max number of power up you can use
        Returns:
        event that contains player's choice

                          int[] possibleSquareY)

        Parameters:
        possibleSquareX - row of possible destination square
        possibleSquareY - column of possible destination square
        Returns:
        a ShotMoveChoiceEvent that contains the chosen position

        newPlayer - new player username
        characterChoice - new player character choose
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • addAmmoTileUpdate

        Event addAmmoTileUpdate(int x,
                        int y,
                        java.lang.String fistColour,
                        java.lang.String secondColour,
                        java.lang.String thirdColour)
        It updates map by adding an ammo tile
        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - column
        fistColour - ammo cube
        secondColour - ammo cube
        thirdColour - ammo cube or power up
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • removeAmmoTileUpdate

        Event removeAmmoTileUpdate(int x,
                           int y)
        It updates map by deleting an ammo tile
        Parameters:
        x - row
        y - column
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • positionUpdate

        Event positionUpdate(Character currCharacter,
                     int x,
                     int y)
        it sets character on a new position on map
        Parameters:
        currCharacter - modified player position
        x - row: if sets at 404, player must be removed
        y - column: if sets at 404, players must be removed
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • playerBoardUpdate

        Event playerBoardUpdate(Character character,
                        int skullNumber,
                        Character[] marks,
                        Character[] damages)
        Modification of player Board(damage, mark, skull)
        Parameters:
        character - modified player board
        skullNumber - number of skull
        marks - number of marks and who did it
        damages - number of damage and who did it
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • playerPowerUpUpdate

        Event playerPowerUpUpdate(Character currCharacter,
                          java.lang.String[] powerUp,
                          CubeColour[] color)
        It shows power up available
        Parameters:
        currCharacter - modified player board
        powerUp - power up of player
        color - colour of power up
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • playerAmmoUpdate

        Event playerAmmoUpdate(Character currCharacter,
                       java.util.ArrayList<AmmoCube> ammo)
        It shows ammo available
        Parameters:
        currCharacter - modified player board
        ammo - ammo of player
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • playerWeaponUpdate

        Event playerWeaponUpdate(Character currCharacter,
                         java.lang.String[] weapons,
                         boolean[] load)
        It shows weapon available
        Parameters:
        currCharacter - modified player board
        weapons - weapons of player
        load - indicates the weapon that are loaded
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • gameTrackSkullUpdate

        Event gameTrackSkullUpdate(Character[] killerCharacter,
                           int[] skullNumber)
        It updates number of skull on the game track
        Parameters:
        killerCharacter - player who takes the skull
        skullNumber - number of skull left: 0-one skull; 1-one damage; 2-two damage;
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • weaponReplaceUpdate

        Event weaponReplaceUpdate(int x,
                          int y,
                          java.lang.String[] weapon)
        It replaces weapons on spawn square
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate x (row)
        y - coordinate y (column)
        weapon - weapon to add
        Returns:
        message notify the success of updating

      • winnerUpdate

        Event winnerUpdate(EndGameUpdate endGameUpdate)
        It shows winner of the game and his point
        Parameters:
        endGameUpdate - is the end-game notification
        Returns:
        an UpdateChoiceEvent

      • playerReconnectionNotify

        Event playerReconnectionNotify(java.lang.String user,
                               Character character,
                               boolean disconnected)
        Print a reconnection or disconnection (depending on disconnected value) update notifying the user and character disconnected
        Parameters:
        user - is the involved user
        character - is the involved user's character
        disconnected - is true if the user was disconnected, false if was reconnected
        Returns:
        event that contains player's choice

      • welcomeChoice

        Event welcomeChoice(boolean[] available,
                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> startedLobbies,
                    java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> waitingLobbies)
        User chooses which game would like to join
        Parameters:
        available - : availableChoice[0] = new game : availableChoice[1] = wait lobby : availableChoice[2] = started game
        startedLobbies - Name of started game
        waitingLobbies - Games are going to begin
        Returns:
        event that contains player's choice

      • printUserNotification

        Event printUserNotification(UsernameModificationEvent usernameEvent)
        it prints on screen the UpdateNotification message, requesting a choice if necessary;
        Parameters:
        usernameEvent - notify modification of a user name
        Returns:
        the answer that will be sent to the server.
